Note: In order to work, this extension requires an application to serve emotes according to this API specification.
Saving these options requires refreshing Element.

This URL has to point to the /emotes path of the emote server.

This can be left blank if the emote server does not require an access key.

The default emote size when emotes are mixed with text.
Has to be a value compatible with the CSS property font-size (default: 2em).

The emote size for standalone emotes (without text in the same message).
Has to be a value compatible with the CSS property font-size (default: 4em).

If enabled, animated emotes (GIF, APNG) will be frozen when Element is not focused.

The number of emote suggestions shown at the same time (default: 10).
